name: I'm here to shit ass for Game Boy
name_original: I'm here to shit ass for Game Boy
description:
The next major release for I'm here to shit ass!

The version for game boy now includes original assets

it's a fucking action game where you battle Bill Fucking Clinton!

Please, do tell us what was your favorite part in the comments section, because we at shitass productions love to hear feedback, whether it's loving our shitting on our games.

This version was made with GB Studio and finished on 3/26/2023
